info.title: API организаций и зданий
info.description: API для управления организациями, зданиями и деятельностью.

get.summary: Get organization details by its ID
List of all organizations located in a specific building

200.description: List of organizations in the specified building

get.summary: List of all organizations related to the specified activity

200.description: List of organizations related to the specified activity

get.summary: искать организации по виду деятельности и его подкатегориям до 3 уровней.

200.description: List of organizations related to the specified activity and its subcategories up to 3 levels.

get.summary: Search for an organization by name

200.description: List of organizations matching the search criteria

get.summary: List of organizations within a specified radius/rectangular area relative to the given point on the map. List of buildings.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius in KM, required if type is 'radius'

parameters.name: area
parameters.description: Rectangle area defined by 4 coordinates (lat1, long1, lat2, long2), required if type is 'rectangle'

200.description: List of organizations matching the search criteria
